name: libero

effect.sword_shield: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
effect.legends_arceus: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

short_effect: Libero changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.
